translation.en: I can still remember laying in my bed,
translation.zh: ‎我还记得 那时我躺在床上

translation.en: my little night-light on, crying over this.
translation.zh: ‎小夜灯亮着 ‎听到这个故事后 我哭了

translation.en: I was so overwhelmed by this story.
Misha Defonseca checked every single box
for the type of woman that we looked for to interview on Exceptional Women.
translation.zh:
‎《非凡女人》
‎采访女性对象的所有条件

translation.en: I'll just take a beat and then turn. I got you. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎我顿了顿 然后转身
‎我懂你的意思 好的

translation.en: Stand by.
Her story originated in Belgium,
but she was living in Millis, Massachusetts,
translation.zh: ‎但她就住在马萨诸塞州米利斯镇

translation.en: 20 miles away from the radio station.
You wanna give me a countdown?
[radio producer] Three, two, one.
[Candy O'Terry] Sometimes a story is so astonishing it seems unbelievable.
translation.zh:
‎有时候 故事太过震撼
‎几乎不可思议

translation.en: Sometimes the sadness one person feels is so big, it's overpowering.
translation.zh: ‎有时候一个人感受到的悲伤太大 ‎大到无法直视

translation.en: And sometimes courage is so monumental, it humbles you.
translation.zh: ‎有时候勇气太大 ‎大得令人谦卑下来

translation.en: [Pat Cunningham] Back in the late '80s, we had been living in Millis for 37 years.
translation.zh:
‎八十年代末
‎我们已经在米利斯镇住了37年

translation.en: Pretty much everybody knew everybody.
And we had new neighbors.
They were a couple from Belgium, Maurice and Misha.
translation.zh:
‎他们是一对来自比利时的夫妇
‎莫里斯和米莎

translation.en: There's a saying in Millis, "Small town, big family."
translation.zh: ‎米利斯镇流传着一句话 ‎“小镇大家庭”

translation.en: It's a small-knit community, and we became friends.
translation.zh:
‎在这座紧密相依的小镇上
‎我们成了彼此的朋友

translation.en: You want a little kiss?
[Pat] Misha was a very nice person. Very friendly, um, caring.
translation.zh:
‎米莎非常友善
‎和蔼可亲、对人关怀备至

translation.en: I had never met anybody that had a relationship with animals as did Misha.
translation.zh:
‎米莎和动物之间的关系非常亲密
‎我从没见过这种人

translation.en: There were many, many cats.
Eccentric personality, for sure.
translation.zh: ‎她个性古怪 这点不用多说

translation.en: I was there one day having tea,
and she told me about her life during the war and so forth.
translation.zh: ‎她把她战争时期的生平故事告诉了我

translation.en: She went into some detail.
[Candy over radio] Let me bring you into the life of a little girl named Misha.
translation.zh:
‎让我带你们走进
‎米莎这个小女孩的人生故事中

translation.en: She was waiting for her father to pick her up from school one day,
translation.zh:
‎有一天
‎她在学校等待父亲来接她回家

translation.en: and he never came.
My mouth just dropped on the floor.
[Candy] Instead a woman tapped her on the shoulder and said, "Come with me."
translation.zh:
‎来的是个女人
‎她轻拍米莎的肩膀说：“跟我走”

translation.en: This little girl was taken into a home with a family she didn't know.
translation.zh: ‎小女孩被带到一个陌生的家里

translation.en: She was given a new name and different clothes.
translation.zh:
‎这个家给她取了一个新的名字
‎让她换上截然不同的衣裳

translation.en: [Candy] When she was only seven years old,
she walked alone for years,
through Nazi-occupied countries, across thousands of miles,
translation.zh: ‎走过被纳粹占据的国家 横跨千里路

translation.en: in search of her deported parents.
translation.zh: ‎寻找已被遣送至集中营的父母

translation.en: Misha is now a grown-up Jewish woman
translation.zh:
‎如今米莎已经是个
‎长大成人的犹太女子

translation.en: living in the Boston area. She's a Holocaust survivor.
translation.zh: ‎住在波士顿一带 ‎她是犹太人大屠杀的幸存者

translation.en: And she's here to tell her astonishing story
translation.zh:
‎如今她来到了现场
‎跟大家分享她不平凡的人生故事

translation.en: of courage and survival.
translation.zh: ‎一个关乎勇气和生存的故事

translation.en: I think about my parents every day.
My mother's name was Gerusha,
and my father, Robert.
Reuven in Hebrew.
But our surname,
I don't think I ever knew.
I never discovered what became of my parents.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我父母当时经历了什么

translation.en: Not where they went or how they died.
translation.zh: ‎不知道他们去了哪里 或是怎么死的

translation.en: To this day, I do not know.
[director] Settle, everybody, please.
So, Misha, tell me the story of the first time
translation.zh:
‎米莎 告诉我
‎你第一次将你的人生经历

translation.en: you spoke about your experiences.
One day…
in a synagogue…
on the occasion of Yom HaShoah, the day of remembrance…
translation.zh: ‎那天是犹太人大屠杀纪念日

translation.en: I was asked to talk about me and my story.
My husband convinced me to do it,
translation.zh: ‎我丈夫说服我去分享这个故事

translation.en: telling me it would free me.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我说 说出来能帮助我释怀

translation.en: When I went up to the bimah,
I suddenly realized that I was going to speak for the first time.
translation.zh:
‎我突然意识到
‎那是我第一次公开讲述这段经历

translation.en: I burst into tears.
And slowly, snatches, I began to tell.
translation.zh: ‎慢慢地 我边抽泣边开始讲述

translation.en: I was cold and I had to keep going
translation.zh: ‎我感到寒冷 但我必须往前走

translation.en: one step at a time.
That is survival.
You have to go forward
one step at a time.
I was, like, mesmerized.
People never knew about her being a Holocaust survivor.
translation.zh:
‎人们以前都不知道
‎她是犹太人大屠杀的幸存者

translation.en: I had tears in my eyes.
She was hungry. She was cold. She was lonely. She wanted her parents.
translation.zh:
‎她当时饥寒交迫、孤苦无依
‎她需要爸爸妈妈

translation.en: How did this person survive?
[Misha Defonseca] I told myself,
"They think I'm alive."
"If they think I'm alive, I can't let them down."
translation.zh:
‎如果他们认为我还活着
‎我就不能让他们失望

translation.en: "So I have to keep going."
[Jane Daniel] You could've heard a pin drop.
Everybody there was just completely entranced with her story.
translation.zh: ‎在场者都深陷于她的故事中

translation.en: [Jane] I never expected that I was gonna hear what I heard.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到自己会听到这种故事

translation.en: When Misha was seven years old, her parents were arrested by the Nazis,
translation.zh: ‎米莎七岁那年 父母被纳粹带走了

translation.en: and she was told that they had been deported.
translation.zh: ‎有人跟她说她父母被遣送至集中营了

translation.en: She was placed in the care of a Catholic family
translation.zh: ‎她被安置在一个天主教家庭里

translation.en: called de Wael.
So it was a safe place for her.
translation.zh: ‎待在那个家里 她不会有危险

translation.en: They gave her a new identity, Monique de Wael.
translation.zh:
‎他们给了她一个新的身份
‎叫莫妮德瓦尔

translation.en: The deception saved her.
But she felt very alienated there.
translation.zh: ‎但待在那个家里 她感到非常孤独

translation.en: [Defonseca] I ended up in a family that didn't love me.
translation.zh: ‎我来到了一个没人爱我的家里

translation.en: That's the least you could say.
They hated me there. They would call me worthless.
translation.zh:
‎他们痛恨我
‎甚至说我是“没用的东西”

translation.en: [Jane] There was a grandfather in that foster family who was kindly to her.
translation.zh: ‎那个寄养家庭中有个老爷爷 ‎对她很好

translation.en: [Defonseca] He told me my parents were in Germany.
He showed me with a compass that it was in the east.
translation.zh: ‎我用一个指南针告诉我德国在东部

translation.en: So Germany didn't seem that far.
[Jane] At that point, Misha made a tremendous decision.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 米莎做了一个关键性的决定

translation.en: It turned her whole life upside down.
translation.zh: ‎这个决定彻底改变了她的一生

translation.en: She decided, at the age of seven,
translation.zh: ‎七岁那年 她做了一个决定

translation.en: she was going to walk to Germany to find her parents.
[Jane] So she took her little compass and took some supplies
translation.zh:
‎于是她带上了小小的指南针
‎以及一些粮食

translation.en: and started heading east.
I know exactly what I need.
I need the basic.
I need food, something to drink,
to have a knife for protection.
The first night I slept below a bridge.
translation.zh: ‎第一夜 我在一座桥底下过夜

translation.en: It was not far from home.
It was absolutely naive when I think about it today.
translation.zh:
‎今天回想起来
‎我认为当初的做法非常幼稚

translation.en: On the map, Belgium seemed really small, and Germany was really close.
translation.zh:
‎地图上 比利时看起来非常小
‎德国看起来近在咫尺

translation.en: But if I went back, what would I find?
translation.zh: ‎要是调转回去 我能找到什么？

translation.en: [Defonseca] Nothing was waiting for me back there.
translation.zh: ‎要是回去了 也没有人在等我

translation.en: And I had the idea to find my parents.
So I had to finish it.
Each time I approach a village, I see devastation.
translation.zh: ‎每次走近村庄 只看到绝望

translation.en: [Jane] What she experienced as a child,
having to hide from the Nazis,
being alone in the forest,
having to steal food,
freezing temperatures…
She had had a nightmare childhood.
She had been traumatized by this.
translation.zh: ‎这段经历让她受到了心灵创伤

translation.en: [Defonseca] Killing…
I saw killing.
[Defonseca] The dead people.
It was really desperate.
[Defonseca] I dreamed of seeing my parents.
So I stayed deeply in the woods away from the war.
translation.zh: ‎于是我在森林深处住下来 远离战乱

translation.en: [Jane] When she was in the woods,
she was away from people being sent to concentration camps.
translation.zh: ‎她避开了被送往集中营的人群

translation.en: She was away from the horror that was happening in the cities.
translation.zh: ‎远离了大城小镇的纷扰惊慌

translation.en: -[Jane] She was with birds and flowers. -[bird chirping]
She said that's what saved her.
[Defonseca] I completely gave in to the wildlife.
I saw this wonderful world with animals…
translation.zh: ‎我看到一个充满野生动物的美好世界

translation.en: in peace,
living normally,
eating just what they need,
not killing more than they need.
The balance was so… just right.
With animals I didn't need any words.
translation.zh: ‎跟动物沟通 我不需要说话

translation.en: We were near each other
in silence
and understood without words.
translation.zh: ‎即使不发一语 也能互相理解

translation.en: [Jane] I was thinking, "This would make a fascinating book."
translation.zh:
‎我心想：
‎“这个故事能写成一本引人入胜的书”

translation.en: It was the early '90s.
I had a small publishing company.
When I say small, I mean tiny.
And I was looking around for a new project.
translation.zh: ‎我当时正在到处寻找新的项目

translation.en: I was the first one that came along and said,
"Could we make this even more public?" "Can we take this to another level?"
translation.zh:
‎“能不能推广这个故事？
‎能不能提升到另一个高度？

translation.en: "I could probably make something big out of this."
"There's a market for this story."
Because it had an amazing twist.
translation.zh: ‎因为这个故事具备精彩的转折点

translation.en: I remember I had just been caught by a farmer who saw me stealing food from his farm.
translation.zh:
‎我记得有一次在某个农场偷窃食物时
‎被一个农夫逮到

translation.en: I run away, full of fear.
translation.zh: ‎我成功逃跑 心里充满恐惧

translation.en: And he ran after me.
When you run for your life, you run very hard.
translation.zh: ‎逃命时 我们总是跑得特别快

translation.en: And suddenly,
I had the impression that somebody was watching me.
I turn around and…
And I see this magnificent animal.
To me, it was like a huge dog.
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 它像一只大狗

translation.en: The wolf seemed alone and I needed a companion.
translation.zh:
‎这只狼形单影只
‎加上我也需要一个旅伴

translation.en: -[wolf howling] -It was a beautiful gray she-wolf.
I look in my bag for something to eat,
and I give a piece to the wolf.
And she doesn't take.
[Defonseca] It takes a lot of time,
but after a while, we would walk in parallel.
translation.zh: ‎一段时间后 我们开始并肩行走

translation.en: I was able to see its generosity…
to appreciate the strength it had.
I was able to live with it.
She was like a mother to me.
Much later, it was a whole pack of wolves.
translation.zh: ‎不久后 一只狼变成一群狼

translation.en: I don't know how long I was with them.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道跟它们生活在一起多久

translation.en: They accepted me and protected me.
translation.zh: ‎它们接纳我 一路保护我

translation.en: That was an amazing twist in her story. It was like, "Who ever hears of that?"
translation.zh:
‎那是个非常精彩的转折点
‎我心想：“没人听过这种故事吧？”

translation.en: "Wow, this is quite a story."
[Joni Soffron] Misha was very different from most people I'd ever met.
translation.zh: ‎米莎和我见过的人有很大的不同

translation.en: My first impression was,
"She probably should've been an animal."
translation.zh: ‎她可能跟动物在一起生活过

translation.en: "Or her spirit is an animal."
translation.zh: ‎或是体内住着一个动物的灵魂

translation.en: She spoke about being accepted by the pack but being treated as a low-ranking member
translation.zh:
‎她说自己曾被狼群接纳
‎被它们视为阶级低下的家族成员

translation.en: and that she had to exhibit submissive, low-ranking behavior
translation.zh:
‎因此她必须表现出顺服
‎卑躬屈膝的态度

translation.en: in order to, uh… to be with them.
Misha said the alpha male typically would eat first.
The others would lay around the carcass waiting for their turn.
translation.zh: ‎其他的狼只能围在动物残骸旁等候

translation.en: They would leave little scraps,
sort of in close proximity to where she was when they were finished.
translation.zh: ‎会在靠近她的地方留下少量的碎片

translation.en: [Defonseca] Wolves eat ten kilos in one meal.
The leftovers were more than enough for me.
translation.zh: ‎留给我的肉比我所需要的还要多

translation.en: Get it.
Go get your dinner. It's right there.
translation.zh: ‎去吃你的晚餐 就在那边

translation.en: [Soffron] We became very good friends.
You got it.
-You got it. Good girl! -[Soffron] She visited multiple times.
translation.zh: ‎这就对了 乖女孩！ ‎她来过好几次

translation.en: She would hand-feed them the pieces of meat.
I think they sensed in Misha
translation.zh: ‎我觉得它们感应到 ‎米莎是同伴 不是敌人

translation.en: that she was a friend, as opposed to a foe.
She had such a sense of being with them,
that it's like she belonged in there.
translation.zh: ‎感觉上她就是狼群的一份子

translation.en: [Defonseca] I had no reason to stop walking.
It's what I did every day.
Day after day, month after month.
I have always the hope to find my parents,
translation.zh: ‎我一直希望能找到我的父母

translation.en: because I figure, "I have survived till now,
translation.zh: ‎我心想 既然我能活到现在

translation.en: and if I have survived as a child, my parents must have survived."
translation.zh:
‎我区区一个小孩能活到现在
‎我父母一定也能

translation.en: And this belief makes me continue.
translation.zh: ‎凭靠这个信念 我继续走下去

translation.en: [Jane] I thought, this is a moral narrative.
translation.zh: ‎我认为这是个具有道德教育性的故事

translation.en: It's the battle between good and evil, the innocent child and the evil Nazis.
translation.zh:
‎这是个关于正邪之战的故事
‎一个单纯的孩子对抗邪恶的纳粹

translation.en: And the child survived.
It had mythic qualities to it.
translation.zh: ‎这个故事具有某种神奇的元素

translation.en: And it could take my publishing company, Mount Ivy Press,
translation.zh: ‎足以让我经营的常春藤山出版社

translation.en: from a little local happening to a worldwide happening.
translation.zh:
‎从一家本地小型出版社
‎进阶至全球大型出版社

translation.en: So I asked Misha if she would be interested in publishing her stories.
translation.zh:
‎于是我问米莎
‎有没有兴趣出版她的故事

translation.en: I brought it up very tentatively.
With everything I went through,
I'd learned to mistrust people.
[Jane] I don't think she was terribly impressed with me,
translation.zh: ‎我相信她当时并不为我所动

translation.en: and there was no reason she should be.
The kind of book I had published before was a legal financial book,
translation.zh:
‎毕竟在那之前
‎我只出版过一本合法理财书

translation.en: not exactly her kind of thing.
[Defonseca] For more than two years I refused,
but my community and my friends said to me, "Misha, do it."
translation.zh:
‎但我社区的人和朋友都鼓励我说：
‎“米莎 去写成书吧

translation.en: "For future generations."
I found myself in hell again.
translation.zh: ‎过程中 我感觉又回到了地狱

translation.en: [Jane] It was a painful process,
but it was as if she was compelled to tell her story.
translation.zh: ‎感觉上她是被逼着说出这段经历

translation.en: As if it was some kind of a catharsis.
Everybody was stepping up.
All the foreign publishers, one after another, after another.
We were selling the translation rights all over the world.
translation.zh:
‎我们也把翻译权
‎卖给世界各地的出版社

translation.en: [Jane] My agent came back from California,
translation.zh:
‎我在加州的经纪人打来说：
‎“迪士尼要这本书的版权”

translation.en: and said, "Disney wants this. Period. They want this."
translation.zh:
‎我在加州的经纪人打来说：
‎“迪士尼要这本书的版权” ‎就一句话 “他们要这本书的版权”

translation.en: This was a case of a hot property.
[Jane] When the book was published in April 1997,
I said, "Let's see if we can get Oprah to do this."
translation.zh:
‎我提议：“看看能不能
‎让奥普拉介绍这本书”

translation.en: Okay, this is one of my all-time favorite moments I'm having on television.
translation.zh: ‎每次上电视 这都是我最期待的时刻

translation.en: [Jane] At that time, Oprah had her book club. If you were one of Oprah's books,
translation.zh:
‎当时奥普拉已经创办了读书会
‎如果能获奥普拉选为推荐书

translation.en: you had a guaranteed sale of a million books. It was like… That was the jackpot.
translation.zh:
‎就保证能畅销百万
‎就像中了头奖一样

translation.en: Then we'll meet back here in a month, and we'll talk…
translation.zh: ‎一个月后 我们再次聚在这里

translation.en: [Jane] And they said, "We're interested."
translation.zh: ‎奥普拉读书会表示对这本书感兴趣

translation.en: I love it!
So that's a big, big, big deal.
And we were beginning to say,
"We are heading into a monster bestseller here."
[Soffron] Jane Daniel told me that Oprah was considering doing the Misha story,
translation.zh: ‎珍丹尼尔跟我说奥普拉想要采访米莎

translation.en: and could they send a production crew here to film Misha in with a wolf.
translation.zh:
‎并问我拍摄团队能不能到狼谷来
‎拍摄米莎和狼相处的画面

translation.en: So, I said, "Yes, of course."
translation.zh: ‎我听了说：“好啊 当然可以”

translation.en: I told Misha before we went into the enclosure,
translation.zh: ‎进入围栏之前 我告诉米莎

translation.en: this was an adult wolf, he was a very big boy.
translation.zh: ‎里面有个成年的野狼 它个子非常大

translation.en: His name was Petro.
[Jane] Nobody went in but Misha.
The sound man had his boom over the fence. He didn't go in.
translation.zh:
‎收音师只敢把麦克风支架伸进篱笆里
‎他不敢进去

translation.en: So, Misha squatted down, and she's feeding this one wolf cheese.
translation.zh: ‎米莎蹲下 给其中一只狼喂食奶酪片

translation.en: And the wolf is very friendly.
Everything's going fine.
And then the wolf decides to put his paws on her shoulders.
translation.zh:
‎突然之间
‎其中一只狼将狼爪放在她的肩膀上

translation.en: [Soffron] Petro jumped up on her shoulders,
and he was much taller than she.
And then all of a sudden, very quickly, the wolf opened his mouth…
translation.zh: ‎那一瞬间 那只狼张开大口

translation.en: [Soffron] …and put her whole head in his mouth.
Very gently.
Fangs on both temples.
[Defonseca] I felt no fear.
Nobody talked about the big bad wolf to me, you know.
translation.zh: ‎以前没人跟我提过有大灰狼这种动物

translation.en: The wolf held her head for a minute. We've stopped breathing.
translation.zh:
‎狼含住了她的头一下
‎那一刻在场者都停止了呼吸

translation.en: Oprah's producer with her eyes like…
translation.zh: ‎奥普拉的制作人眼睛瞪得老大

translation.en: [Jane] And then just as fast as it happened,
translation.zh: ‎整个过程只是一瞬间 回过神时

translation.en: it was over.
And at that point, Misha rears back, lets out a big howl.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 米莎往后仰 发出一声狼嚎

translation.en: I get goosebumps telling this story.
translation.zh: ‎说起这件往事 我都会起鸡皮疙瘩

translation.en: From the back, way back in the back of the pen,
we hear…
…an "awoo" coming back.
When she howled, they immediately howled back.
translation.zh: ‎她发出狼嚎时 狼群也报以一声狼嚎

translation.en: [Jane] There it was. You could see.
There's the connection between the human and the wolf.
I saw it, you know. It was amazing. It was a shocking moment.
translation.zh:
‎我亲眼看到了 太神奇了
‎那一幕令人非常震惊

translation.en: So, they had got a lot of really interesting wolf footage,
translation.zh:
‎剧组拍到了
‎不少有意思的人狼画面

translation.en: and I thought, "This is gonna make a great Oprah show."
translation.zh:
‎我心想：
‎“这将会是一部精彩的电视节目”

translation.en: The next step was that she was to go to Chicago for the studio portion.
translation.zh: ‎下一步就是邀请她到芝加哥录影

translation.en: [Soffron] Things were going swimmingly well.
And then, I began to see some tension
translation.zh: ‎接着我发现米莎和珍之间的关系

translation.en: between Misha and Jane.
It wasn't very pleasant as time went on.
translation.zh: ‎后来她们相处得越来越不愉快

translation.en: [Pat] The book wasn't selling very well,
so Misha and Maurice, her husband, were having financial difficulties.
translation.zh: ‎米莎和莫里斯开始面临财务状况

translation.en: So then she started selling things, from her house.
And, um…
I felt bad that they were losing everything.
translation.zh:
‎看到他们失去一切
‎我替他们感到难过

translation.en: [Karen Schulman] She kept saying, "I have no money. I have nothing."
translation.zh: ‎她总是说：“我没钱了 一无所有

translation.en: "Jane Daniel's no good."
I felt saddened,
but then Misha was sitting at my table one night and said to me
translation.zh:
‎后来有一晚
‎米莎坐在我家桌前对我说

translation.en: she didn't wanna go on Oprah Winfrey.
I said, "Gee, Misha, I don't understand that."
translation.zh: ‎我听了说：“天啊 米莎 我不明白”

translation.en: [Jane] All of a sudden, Misha's not cooperative,
translation.zh: ‎突然之间 米莎开始拒绝合作

translation.en: doesn't return phone calls, has one objection after another.
translation.zh: ‎不回电话 不断提出反对意见

translation.en: She doesn't wanna go, it's inconvenient,
translation.zh: ‎她不想去见奥普拉 说是不方便

translation.en: she needs somebody to take care of her animals at home.
translation.zh: ‎她需要人照顾家里的小动物

translation.en: [Defonseca] Jane made me so mad, so insecure.
translation.zh: ‎珍让我感到非常生气、惶恐不安

translation.en: My husband said many times to her,
"With a survivor, you don't use that kind of attitude."
translation.zh:
‎叫她别用这种态度
‎对待犹太人大屠杀幸存者

translation.en: [Jane] Come on. It's Oprah.
You find a dog-sitter or a pet-sitter or whatever.
translation.zh: ‎大可找个保姆照顾狗狗和小动物啊

translation.en: You make yourself available.
"No."
[Defonseca] Well, the memory, the bad memory, came back.
translation.zh: ‎过往不愉快的回忆再次涌上心头

translation.en: I have a nightmare. I was very anxious.
translation.zh: ‎我做了一个噩梦 感到非常焦虑

translation.en: [Jane] We tried everything.
I wrote her notes and said, "This is a million sales."
translation.zh:
‎我给了她写了一张纸条
‎上面写着：“这可是百万销量”

translation.en: "No. No. No."
I thought, "This is crazy."
"Any other author would be falling all over themselves to do this."
translation.zh:
‎任何一个作家
‎做梦都希望上奥普拉的节目

translation.en: It never happened.
[Jane] A year after the book came out,
there's a knock on the door, and I'm handed a big package.
translation.zh: ‎有人来敲我家的门 递上一个包裹

translation.en: It's Misha filing a lawsuit against me.
It's like, "Oh, my God." And at that point, everything stopped.
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“天啊” ‎所有业务都停止了
‎各国出版社都不愿意跟我们交涉

translation.en: No other country wanted to do business with us.
translation.zh:
‎所有业务都停止了
‎各国出版社都不愿意跟我们交涉

translation.en: We had a lawsuit attached to this project.
[Ramona Hamblin] The first time I met Misha,
I felt very compelled by the circumstances of the case.
translation.zh: ‎我感到有义务要处理这个案子

translation.en: It was clear to me
that several things had, um, been done that were improper, illegal, fraudulent.
translation.zh:
‎有几件事的处理手法
‎显然不妥、违法和具有诈骗性质

translation.en: Misha was asking for the return of the copyright to her name
translation.zh:
‎米莎要求出版社
‎将版权费归还于其名下

translation.en: and for all of the royalties that she was due for book sales.
Jane Daniel saw in my life a gold mine,
translation.zh: ‎珍丹尼尔把我的人生视为“金矿”

translation.en: and she took advantage of it.
[Hamblin] There was so much anger and bitterness between the parties by the time that I got involved,
translation.zh: ‎我介入时 双方都对彼此充满愤恨

translation.en: there was not much room for negotiation.
And it was clear we were gonna be going to trial. It wasn't gonna settle out of court.
translation.zh:
‎看来唯有对簿公堂了
‎庭外和解是不可能的

translation.en: [Soffron] The sense in the courtroom was a lot of drama.
translation.zh: ‎当时法庭氛围充满戏剧张力

translation.en: The atmosphere was pretty tense.
And then, of course, the money comes up.
[Hamblin] We found that Jane Daniel had set up a company in the Turks and Caicos,
translation.zh:
‎我们发现珍丹尼尔
‎在特克斯和凯科斯群岛 ‎设立了一家公司

translation.en: so that royalties that came from overseas
went directly into her account and never paid royalties on them.
translation.zh:
‎直接汇入她的账户
‎不必将版税交付给作者

translation.en: We had documentation.
We had royalty statements to show that she was paid.
translation.zh:
‎也有版税声明
‎证明她已经收取了版税

translation.en: We had canceled checks that showed that she was paid.
translation.zh:
‎我们也有已付支票
‎证明她已经收取了版税

translation.en: So everything she was saying, we had documentation to refute.
translation.zh:
‎她所说的一切
‎我们都能通过文件证据来反驳

translation.en: But she could speak no falsehood.
You know, "Where's the money?" And I think the jury was very sympathetic.
translation.zh:
‎问题是：“钱跑哪里去了？”
‎我认为陪审团极富同情心

translation.en: [Hamblin] The jury was riveted.
In front of you is a person who'd survived the Holocaust as a child
translation.zh:
‎站在我们眼前的 是个小时候
‎在犹太人大屠杀中活下来的人

translation.en: and written a memoir about it.
translation.zh: ‎以及一本以她为主的回忆录

translation.en: They were engaged and absolutely enthralled by this story.
Misha was a good witness.
translation.zh: ‎米莎是个理想的历史见证者

translation.en: All what I lived is on the manuscript,
translation.zh: ‎我的整个人生都印在手稿上

translation.en: because it's my life.
[Jane huffs] It just made me look like a monster.
translation.zh: ‎整件事让我看起来像个恶魔

translation.en: And I thought, "This is not going well."
Jane was always fighting. She enforced what she want.
translation.zh:
‎珍是个善于争取的人
‎她竭尽所能达到目的

translation.en: [Jane] It was a ten-day trial, and it was grueling.
translation.zh: ‎诉讼期持续十日 每天都很难熬

translation.en: The judge asks the jury, "How do you find on count one?"
translation.zh:
‎法官向陪审团发问：
‎“第一条罪状成立吗？”

translation.en: The jury found unanimously for Misha on all counts.
translation.zh:
‎陪审团一致通过
‎米莎起诉的所有罪状均成立

translation.en: I mean, ultimately, they came in with a massive judgment against me.
translation.zh: ‎陪审团最终对我下达了严重的裁决

translation.en: It was kind of mind-boggling to hear the number.
22.5 million.
So it was a very large verdict.
I am an optimistic person, but that hit me like a ton of bricks.
translation.zh:
‎我向来是个乐观的人
‎但这个判决给了我一个重重的打击

translation.en: I was blown away.
I said, "Are you kidding me?"
[Hamblin] The money damages against Jane Daniel
were largely based on Jane Daniel's testimony.
translation.zh:
‎有很大部分
‎是按照珍丹尼尔的供词裁定

translation.en: This was gonna be on Oprah, there was some contract with Disney.
translation.zh:
‎她说她将上奥普拉秀
‎她和迪士尼签了合同

translation.en: There were things that Jane Daniel testified to
to really elevate the level of damages
translation.zh: ‎大大地提高了赔偿金的数额

translation.en: well beyond what would seem supportable for a book like this.
translation.zh: ‎金额远远超出类似回忆录应有的范畴

translation.en: So everybody paid attention.
translation.zh: ‎这起诉讼案引起了民众的注意

translation.en: People love a big verdict.
translation.zh: ‎民众都非常喜欢这种严重裁决

translation.en: [Jane] Disney had fallen through. Oprah had fallen through.
translation.zh:
‎跟迪士尼和奥普拉合作的项目
‎不了了之

translation.en: There were no millions of dollars.
It's an untenable position to be in.
translation.zh: ‎我站在一个非常不利的位置

translation.en: A cruel exploiter of an innocent Holocaust survivor.
translation.zh:
‎一个冷血的人在剥削
‎一个无辜的犹太人大屠杀受害者

translation.en: You know, your world falls apart at that point.
translation.zh: ‎从那一刻起 我的整个世界离析分崩

translation.en: [Jane] After the trial,
this was the lowest point in my life.
translation.zh: ‎我经历了人生最低潮的时刻

translation.en: I ended up going into therapy and being diagnosed with PTSD.
translation.zh:
‎我必须去接受心理治疗
‎后来被诊断出患上创伤后压力症

translation.en: And I had horrible insomnia.
I was hanging on by my fingernails.
My publishing company was gone. The copyright was taken away from me.
translation.zh: ‎出版社倒闭 版权被夺走

translation.en: I mean, I was destroyed at that point.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 我整个人生都毁了

translation.en: I ended up doing a post-mortem on what had happened,
translation.zh: ‎后来我开始检讨所发生的一切

translation.en: looking at it piece by piece by piece.
I was in my lawyer's office going through old records and documents.
translation.zh:
‎我坐在律师的办事处
‎检查每个旧记录和文件

translation.en: I had no idea what I was gonna find.
translation.zh: ‎当时我并不知道自己即将发现什么

translation.en: I open a file, and it's Misha's bank account.
translation.zh:
‎我打开某个档案
‎里面是米莎的银行账户

translation.en: And it's in Misha's writing, and it's her signature card.
And on there, it says…
…date and place of birth, filled in in Misha's hand,
translation.zh: ‎米莎亲笔填写的出生日期和地点

translation.en: and mother's maiden name.
All of a sudden, I suddenly get a flash.
[Jane] She knows who she is. She knows where she was born.
translation.zh: ‎她很清楚自己的身份和出生地点

translation.en: [Jane] She knows who her mother was.
This was stuff she supposedly didn't know. She lost her identity in the war.
translation.zh:
‎按道理这些事她不可能知道的
‎她已经在战乱中失去了身份

translation.en: This doesn't add up.
[Jane] Clearly, she knew a lot more about who she was than what she had told me.
translation.zh:
‎她对自己身世的理解
‎显然比之前对我说的还要多

translation.en: What else might not be true?
I had been owned by courts and lawyers.
My life had been turned upside down. I wanted my life back.
translation.zh:
‎我整个人生天翻地覆
‎我要恢复原来的人生

translation.en: [Jane] If I can prove that she's not who she's been saying she is,
translation.zh: ‎如果能证明她并非她口述中的那个人

translation.en: I can overturn this judgment.
It was the dead of winter. The days were short.
translation.zh: ‎那天正值严冬 日短夜长

translation.en: I was standing in my kitchen,
and I thought, "I have to do something. I have to do something."
[Jane] I started recalling all the things that had happened.
translation.zh: ‎我开始回忆起之前所发生过的一切

translation.en: How I had met her, what had happened then, what happened this…
translation.zh:
‎想起当初怎么见到她
‎以及整件事的来龙去脉

translation.en: How did the lawsuit come about?
translation.zh: ‎这起诉讼案究竟是怎么爆发的？

translation.en: And then I thought,
"I'll write a book about the case. I'll do it as a blog."
translation.zh:
‎我要针对这件事写一本书
‎然后放在博客上

translation.en: I was writing my memoir of her memoir.
translation.zh: ‎我以自己的角度来写出她的回忆录

translation.en: And maybe somebody will read it.
Talk about a long shot.
The next day, I get up,
I turn on my computer, and there's an e-mail.
translation.zh: ‎打开电脑 我收到了一封电邮

translation.en: And the e-mail says…
[Sharon Sergeant] "I think I might be able to help find out what's the real story."
I did a timeline of Misha from a variety of photographs.
translation.zh:
‎我根据一系列照片
‎针对米莎的生平做了一个时间线

translation.en: First from the book,
and then from other images on the Internet.
translation.zh: ‎再加上网络上找来的其他影像

translation.en: So I could get a sense of her life.
I wanted to know who she was.
Who is this person that has just ruined my life?
translation.zh: ‎这个摧毁我人生的人到底是谁？

translation.en: Each photograph I tried to analyze
translation.zh: ‎我必须努力分析每一张照片

translation.en: and see what kind of information I could squeeze out of it.
The first clue was Misha claims she was seven years old
translation.zh: ‎第一条线索是 米莎声称

translation.en: when she was taken in by this foster family.
translation.zh: ‎她被寄养家庭带走时年仅七岁

translation.en: In the American book there was a series
translation.zh:
‎在美国出版的回忆录中
‎里面有好几张

translation.en: of what they call polyphoto images.
And the polyphotos were taken at that time.
translation.zh: ‎这些多联照都是在她七岁时拍下的

translation.en: And I looked at the photos, and I said, [clicks tongue]
"No, this doesn't look like a 7-year-old."
translation.zh: ‎“不对 这不像是七岁的孩子

translation.en: "This looks like a toddler, a three or four-year-old."
Big bow in her hair, frilly clothes and chubby, chubby cheeks.
translation.zh:
‎头上戴着大蝴蝶结 穿着镶褶边衣裳
‎面颊圆滚滚的

translation.en: Something's wrong.
The next photograph I looked at
was a picture who Misha said was her foster grandfather and grandmother.
translation.zh:
‎米莎声称照片上的人物
‎分别是她的寄养祖父和祖母

translation.en: According to the narrative, he's a rustic farm man.
translation.zh:
‎按照她的说法
‎她的寄养祖父是个粗旷的农民

translation.en: I did a close-up of the hands of Grandfather, which were manicured.
translation.zh:
‎我近看老爷爷的双手
‎指甲修剪得宜

translation.en: Did not look like a farm person's hands.
And he had a ring on one of his fingers.
translation.zh: ‎他其中一根手指上戴着一枚戒指

translation.en: Yeah, it was not the kind of thing a farmer would wear.
And then the little dog on Grandmother's lap,
translation.zh: ‎还有坐在老奶奶腿上的那只小狗

translation.en: that looks like a little house dog, not a farm dog.
translation.zh:
‎看起来像一只宠物狗
‎不像是农场里的狗

translation.en: So I thought, "Gee, that's strange."
And that's when I started comparing the French and the American book.
translation.zh:
‎于是我开始比较
‎法国版和美国版的回忆录

translation.en: I was looking at names and places and dates.
translation.zh: ‎我查看书里出现的姓名、地点和日期

translation.en: That was the big red flag.
[Jane] She called me and she said,
"Do you notice that Misha's name that she used in the French book
translation.zh:
‎“你有没有注意到
‎米莎在法国版和美国版

translation.en: is different from the name she used in the American book?"
In the American book, the name that she was given
translation.zh: ‎在美国版中 ‎她提到收养她的家庭姓“德瓦尔”

translation.en: by the foster family that took her in was de Wael.
translation.zh: ‎她提到收养她的家庭姓“德瓦尔”

translation.en: What Sharon noticed immediately is the French book,
translation.zh: ‎莎朗第一时间发现 在法国版中

translation.en: the foster family gave her the name Valle, V-A-L-L-E.
translation.zh:
‎她提到寄养家庭
‎给她的新姓氏则是“瓦尔”

translation.en: Why would you have two different names?
[Sharon] There's too many discrepancies,
between the name changes, the pictures, and so on.
Fishy, yep. Definitely seemed fishy.
[director] Take a drink if you want. Just relax.
translation.zh:
‎想喝就喝吧 放轻松
‎我也懂这种事容易令人紧张

translation.en: I know it's a nerve-wracking thing.
translation.zh:
‎想喝就喝吧 放轻松
‎我也懂这种事容易令人紧张 ‎（米莎 采访）

translation.en: [Jane] If her story were true and I were doubting it…
translation.zh:
‎如果她的故事是真的
‎我却质疑其真实性

translation.en: there's something particularly
vicious
doubt somebody who's telling the truth
about something awful that happened to them
and the callousness that it takes to say, "I don't believe you."
translation.zh:
‎我们还要怀疑其真实性 ‎声称：“我不相信”
‎这么做是非常无情的

translation.en: And the harm you can cause by doing that.
That was in my mind.
On the other hand, what was also in my mind is, "So many discrepancies."
translation.zh: ‎另一边厢 我也觉得太多矛盾了

translation.en: Why would you be saying things that aren't true, unless you're crazy?
translation.zh: ‎为什么要骗人这种事？ ‎除非疯了

translation.en: Maybe she's so traumatized that she's just lost her grip on reality.
translation.zh:
‎也许她受过重大的精神创伤
‎导致她分不清虚幻和现实

translation.en: How much did that explain? I didn't know.
I needed a lot of answers at that point.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 我需要大量证据

translation.en: We need boots on the ground in Belgium.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须亲自前往比利时一趟

translation.en: [Jane] Sharon had a connection with a Belgian genealogist
translation.zh: ‎莎朗认识一个比利时系谱学家

translation.en: who herself was a Holocaust survivor.
translation.zh: ‎她本人就是犹太人大屠杀的幸存者

translation.en: As it turns out, she grew up in the same area that Misha claims to have lived in.
translation.zh:
‎后来我们也发现
‎她也是来自米莎声称住过的地方

translation.en: During the war, I myself was a hidden child.
translation.zh:
‎战争期间 我就是其中一个
‎“被藏匿起来的犹太遗孤”

translation.en: I went to a Catholic school,
and I became a very good little Belgian, Catholic girl.
translation.zh:
‎成了一个信奉天主教
‎循规蹈矩的比利时女孩

translation.en: I have no recollection of anybody telling me
what happened to my parents.
translation.zh: ‎跟我提起过我父母发生了什么事

translation.en: I have no memory at all.
I was about 40 and went through a sort of terrible breakdown…
translation.zh: ‎大约40岁时 我突然精神崩溃

translation.en: which led me to find what happened to me, in fact,
translation.zh:
‎这件事让我开始去寻找
‎我过去发生过什么事

translation.en: and to my parents and my family.
And I started to make research.
I found out my father was deported to Auschwitz in September '42.
translation.zh:
‎我发现我父亲在1942年9月
‎被遣送至奥斯威辛集中营

translation.en: My mother was arrested in October in Brussels
translation.zh: ‎我母亲于同年10月在布鲁塞尔被捕

translation.en: and deported to Auschwitz.
translation.zh: ‎然后被遣送至奥斯威辛集中营

translation.en: I was told that they didn't come back.
translation.zh: ‎有人跟我说他们从此一去不回

translation.en: So, I went by car to Auschwitz.
translation.zh: ‎于是我决定坐车前往奥斯威辛集中营

translation.en: I saw the camp…
where there was not a single soul.
The chamber… The gas chambers were exploded.
I found some candles, what we call Jahrzeit,
translation.zh:
‎我在毒气室的断壁残垣中
‎发现一种蜡烛

translation.en: still burning in the rubbles of some of the gas chambers.
translation.zh:
‎我们犹太人常用的一种蜡烛
‎蜡烛仍未烧尽

translation.en: Before leaving,
I had a Star of David done in dried flowers.
translation.zh: ‎我用干花折成了一个大卫星

translation.en: I just didn't know…
where to put it.
I couldn't put it at the monument.
So, finally, I chose the…
the little pond.
It floated there.
And I think that was the time that I…
[softly] Sorry.
Sorry.
…that I put my parents to rest.
My parents, my grandmother, my cousin.
translation.zh: ‎让我父母、奶奶和表亲安息了

translation.en: [Jane] Evelyne is herself a Holocaust survivor
translation.zh: ‎伊夫琳本人就是犹太人大屠杀幸存者

translation.en: whose story was very much like Misha's.
So she was the perfect person to find what was going on.
translation.zh: ‎所以她是最合适找出真相的人

translation.en: [Sharon] In the French book, the foster family had a surname of Valle.
translation.zh:
‎在法国版中
‎米莎的寄养家庭姓“瓦尔”

translation.en: And in the American book the foster family's surname was de Wael.
translation.zh:
‎在美国版中
‎她的寄养家庭却是姓“德瓦尔”

translation.en: To reconcile the name changes,
Evelyne went through the city directories
translation.zh: ‎伊夫琳翻遍了从二十世纪30年代

translation.en: for the 1930s, 1940s.
[Evelyne] I came at least three days searching for the de Waels and the Valles.
translation.zh:
‎我用了起码三天寻找
‎姓“德瓦尔”和“瓦尔”的家族

translation.en: The name Valle was not in the phone books.
The Valle name didn't exist.
De Wael, yes.
There were many de Wael. Many, many, many, many.
translation.zh: ‎姓“德瓦尔”的人很多 非常多

translation.en: [Jane] So, now you start to think,
the French book was distributed in Belgium,
and if something about Misha's story is not true,
translation.zh: ‎如果米莎的故事与真相不符

translation.en: it would be important for her not to put her real name in that French book.
translation.zh: ‎她必须避免在法国版中采用真名

translation.en: There would be somebody over there who would say, "I knew the de Wael family."
translation.zh:
‎不然有人看了会说：
‎“我认识德瓦里家的人”

translation.en: "I know whether or not she was around, or did she disappear during the war."
translation.zh:
‎“我能证明她是不是还活着
‎或是已在战乱中失联”

translation.en: [Sharon] The fact that she changed the name in France and Belgium
from de Wael to Valle,
suggests to me that she's trying to hide something.
translation.zh: ‎让我怀疑她企图隐瞒一些事

translation.en: [Jane] Sharon and I both looked at this and said,
"Something's really wrong with this story."
So, at this point, the book had been taken over by a French publisher,
translation.zh:
‎当时这本回忆录的版权
‎已经转卖给法国的一家出版社

translation.en: who had published it in 20 languages.
translation.zh: ‎后者将书翻译成20种语言出版

translation.en: It was a huge bestseller all over Europe.
She was speaking to schoolchildren all over the French-speaking world.
translation.zh: ‎她走遍法语国家的学校对学生们演讲

translation.en: [Marie-Claire Mommer speaking French] In 2005,
I was planning on creating
as a professor of psychology a project on the story of this young child
translation.zh:
‎我打算针对
‎这个小女孩的种种历险故事

translation.en: who experienced all these adventures.
The project became a huge, magnificent exhibition.
translation.zh: ‎该项目后来演变成了一场大型 ‎大规模的展览会

translation.en: Then we have the idea
translation.zh: ‎之后我们打算带她到比利时办活动

translation.en: to try and bring her to Belgium.
translation.zh: ‎之后我们打算带她到比利时办活动 ‎（玛丽克莱莫梅）

translation.en: We watched her get out of the train.
It was a fascinating sight.
She was dressed in blue…
like a shining canary
with all its colors…
…with two,
no, three big suitcases!
She came towards me all radiant and beaming.
translation.zh:
‎她朝我走过来
‎看起来光彩夺目、明艳照人

translation.en: Right away, she exhibits a very dynamic character,
translation.zh: ‎她马上展现出非常活泼开朗的个性

translation.en: very welcoming and very generous.
When Misha entered the exhibition,
translation.zh: ‎米莎走进展览会场那一瞬间

translation.en: she collapsed.
[Defonseca, in French] I was not warned of this, so when I visited the exhibition,
translation.zh:
‎我之前并没有料到
‎因此参观展览会场时

translation.en: I burst into tears because it touched me very deeply.
translation.zh: ‎眼泪夺眶而出 我深深受到了感动

translation.en: [Mommer, in French] She was so delighted to be there.
But on the other hand,
we saw the sadness come out
translation.zh: ‎我们也看到她透露出的悲伤

translation.en: and the tears, the tears, the tears.
It was very emotional.
[in French] We were all really traumatized by her story
translation.zh: ‎我们为她的经历感到悲恸不已

translation.en: and we all wanted to give a bit of joy to this woman
translation.zh: ‎因此希望能通过艺术创作和勇气

translation.en: by showing our creativity and our courage, too,
to show what we felt.
[Jane, in English] In the book, Misha says that her parents
translation.zh:
‎米莎在书中提到
‎她父母同时被纳粹俘虏

translation.en: were arrested together by the Nazis and deported.
translation.zh:
‎米莎在书中提到
‎她父母同时被纳粹俘虏 ‎双双被遣送至集中营

translation.en: Although she didn't know their surname, their first names were Reuven and Gerusha.
translation.zh:
‎既然她对父母的姓氏一无所知
‎只知道他们分别叫鲁文和杰茹莎

translation.en: So, the next step was, Sharon said,
"I have access to the Nazi records of deportations."
"Well, I will take those two names
and see if there are two people who were deported
translation.zh: ‎我去查查这两个名字的主人

translation.en: more or less simultaneously with those names."
translation.zh: ‎是不是同时被遣送至集中营

translation.en: [Sharon] When we examined the deportation lists,
they were not found as a husband and wife.
[Defonseca, in French] "I missed my parents terribly."
"My face was covered in mud."
"I screamed… some nights, from the cold."
translation.zh: ‎寒冷的黑夜里 我放声尖叫

translation.en: "Later on,
I got a second chance."
"I survived because I trusted no one."
translation.zh: ‎我能活下来 是因为我不信任任何人

translation.en: "Because I avoided contact with humans."
[Evelyne, in English] During the war, the Jewish Defence Committee
translation.zh: ‎战争期间 犹太保卫同盟

translation.en: had made lists of hidden Jewish children
with the name of their rescuer and the name of their parents.
translation.zh:
‎拯救他们的人和孩子们的父母
‎做了一个名单

translation.en: These lists are now in the archives at the War Victims Services.
translation.zh:
‎这些名单
‎如今收藏在战争遇难者服务处里

translation.en: It was a real, real, real danger
that these lists would be taken by the Nazis.
translation.zh: ‎这些名单一旦落在纳粹手上

translation.en: Children would be found,
and be, uh, killed.
But it was quite clever.
There were four different booklets.
You needed all four to find the child.
translation.zh:
‎要找到孩子的行踪
‎就必须凑齐四本名册

translation.en: But all four of them were in different places.
translation.zh: ‎四本名册都散落在四个不同地点

translation.en: If any Nazi found a single booklet,
they would not be able to trace the child,
but at the end of the war,
with the four different booklets,
there would've been a way to find whose child it was.
translation.zh: ‎就能找出这些孩子们的父母身份

translation.en: And so I searched for Misha's parents.
No names of the parents.
So, I knew there that there was something wrong.
And in the lists of hidden children,
they didn't have "Misha," and they didn't have "de Wael,"
translation.zh:
‎没有“米莎”这个名字
‎也没有“德瓦尔”这个姓氏

translation.en: that is for sure.
She was not mentioned at all.
[Mommer, in French] Misha's story had a snowball effect.
translation.zh: ‎米莎的故事像雪球般越滚越大

translation.en: Already millions of books had been sold.
And thereafter, we had to work to prepare the conferences and get her to them.
translation.zh:
‎事后我们开始着手准备研讨会
‎并要邀请她出席

translation.en: So, we were always together.
At that time, she would often come back to our home.
She would eat with us. She was like a member of the family.
translation.zh: ‎跟我们一起用餐 就像家人一样

translation.en: We had dozens of events.
Of course, we took her to them.
She was always welcomed by the organizers
and always with a lot of kindness and friendliness.
Everyone left the conferences
dazzled by this character.
[Evelyne, in English] I was stuck, really.
No findings but no proof.
No proof.
So that was the point where I thought that she could've been undocumented.
translation.zh:
‎那一刻
‎我认为她也有可能被遗漏的孩子

translation.en: Some children were hidden but not necessarily through organization.
translation.zh: ‎有些孩子并非被组织藏匿起来

translation.en: As extraordinary as her story was,
I had to keep in mind
that she might have been a Jewish hidden child.
translation.zh:
‎她的确有可能是
‎被藏匿起来的犹太遗孤

translation.en: [in French] We are going to talk about this strange and wonderful story.
translation.zh: ‎我们要聊聊这件传奇和精彩的故事

translation.en: Misha Defonseca is with us. Hello.
translation.zh: ‎现场有米莎德冯塞卡 你好

translation.en: Hello.
Thank you for coming to see us to tell us about this story.
translation.zh: ‎感谢你上节目跟我们讲这个故事

translation.en: [Jane, in English] Now the stakes go up. I start worrying.
translation.zh:
‎如今风险越来越高了
‎我开始担忧起来

translation.en: I will feel a lot of guilt, if this is true,
translation.zh: ‎如果故事是真的 我会充满罪恶感

translation.en: that I am digging into her past.
And what if it is true?
[in French] Misha Defonseca is a witness of the Holocaust.
translation.zh:
‎米莎德冯塞卡
‎是犹太人大屠杀的见证人

translation.en: Hello.
[Jane, in English] How unfair to challenge her.
And even if it's mostly true but not quite true,
how unfair to disrespect what she's been through.
translation.zh: ‎对她所经历过的往事也是大不敬

translation.en: [in French] You have to go through all the tragedy
and all the horrors.
translation.zh: ‎以及那么多心惊胆颤的时刻

translation.en: It's very painful.
I felt like I had been cast in a play that I didn't audition for.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉自己就像在未经试镜下
‎参演了一出戏

translation.en: I didn't want the part. I didn't wanna be in the play.
translation.zh: ‎我不想演 我不想参演这出戏

translation.en: [in French] I have known hatred
and I have known the rage to kill
because it's my life or his.
translation.zh:
‎因为这种种元素
‎都存在于我和他的生命中

translation.en: It was devouring me.
[in French] Personally…
I live it every day.
This had taken over my own life.
[in French] I think about my parents every day, and for me,
the Holocaust is every day. The memory stays with you every day.
translation.zh: ‎天天都想到犹太人大屠杀 ‎这段记忆永远伴随着我们

translation.en: [Jane] But I'd had this judgment hanging over my head for quite a while now.
translation.zh: ‎有一阵子 我满脑子都是疑惑

translation.en: I had lost the appeal.
I was looking at the possibility of being completely wiped out.
translation.zh: ‎我很可能会因此而彻底被击溃

translation.en: So it was starting to get pretty uncomfortable,
translation.zh: ‎于是我开始感到非常不舒服

translation.en: but I needed to get to the truth.
So, when we had no Jewish records to support her story,
translation.zh: ‎犹太文献中没有记载她的来历

translation.en: the question is, maybe she's not even Jewish.
[Evelyne] If she's not Jewish,
then she must be, most likely, Catholic.
If she was Catholic, perhaps she was baptized.
translation.zh: ‎如果她是天主教徒 那可能受洗过

translation.en: [Sharon] Misha Defonseca's bank record from the trial records
translation.zh:
‎米莎德冯塞卡
‎在诉讼期间提供的银行记录

translation.en: said that she was born in 1937,
her mother's maiden name was Donville, and she was born in Etterbeek.
translation.zh: ‎娘家姓唐维尔 出生于埃特尔贝克

translation.en: [Evelyne] Etterbeek, a suburb of Brussels.
translation.zh: ‎埃特尔贝克是布鲁塞尔的一个小区

translation.en: So, in Etterbeek, I searched for different churches.
translation.zh: ‎我到布鲁塞尔的不同教会查看

translation.en: [Jane] So Evelyne went to the first one. The records weren't there.
translation.zh:
‎伊夫琳去了第一间教堂
‎找不到相关记录

translation.en: [Evelyne] Went to another one…
[Jane] No baptismal record that matched Misha's information.
translation.zh: ‎没有符合米莎个人资料的洗礼记录

translation.en: [Evelyne] And to the third one in the area…
[Jane] As it turns out, the church had burnt to the ground.
When we learned that, I thought… [groans]
"We're probably sunk now, because the records probably were destroyed in the fire."
translation.zh:
‎真相可能已经石沉大海
‎毕竟相关记录可能已经烧毁了

translation.en: [Evelyne] But the offices, the presbytère,
was in an adjoining street.
They were preserved.
So, Evelyne was looking date by date by date, all the children born in that parish.
translation.zh:
‎于是伊夫琳按照生日
‎查找该教区出生的孩子

translation.en: I knew two things:
Her date of birth, 12th of May, 1937,
and the mother's name, Donville.
And in that book, I found her.
translation.zh: ‎在那本名册中 我找到了她

translation.en: "Monica Ernestina Josephine de Wael…
translation.zh: ‎“莫妮卡埃内斯蒂娜约瑟芬德瓦尔”

translation.en: daughter of Roberti Henrici Ernesti de Wael
translation.zh: ‎父亲是罗伯迪亨瑞奇埃内斯蒂德瓦尔

translation.en: and Josephinae Germanae Barbarae Donvil."
translation.zh: ‎母亲是约瑟芬娜杰曼妮芭芭拉唐维尔

translation.en: The revelation was that Misha's father's name was de Wael.
translation.zh: ‎我们发现米莎的父亲姓德瓦尔

translation.en: So, at that point, it seemed that Monique de Wael was her real name.
translation.zh:
‎那一刻
‎莫妮德瓦尔看似才是她的真名

translation.en: It wasn't a name given to her by foster parents to hide her from the Nazis.
translation.zh:
‎跟她寄养父母为了躲避纳粹追捕
‎而给她取的姓名有出入

translation.en: It seemed like she was born Monique de Wael.
translation.zh: ‎看似她生下就被取名叫莫妮德瓦尔

translation.en: She was a Catholic. She was baptized Catholic.
Her father was de Wael.
However, it wasn't proof conclusive.
translation.zh: ‎然而 这并不足以构成证据

translation.en: Because in those days, they used to take names of dead children
translation.zh:
‎毕竟在那个年代
‎人们经常用死去孩童的名字

translation.en: and give them to Jewish children, by way of hiding them.
translation.zh:
‎给新生的犹太儿童取名字
‎以将他们藏匿起来

translation.en: It was possible that the de Waels had taken in a hidden child
translation.zh:
‎也有可能是德瓦尔夫妇收养了
‎这个被藏匿起来的孩子

translation.en: and that their own child had died.
translation.zh: ‎而他们的亲生孩子已经死了

translation.en: I needed further proof.
[director] So what did you do next?
[chuckles] Off the record, this is a good question.
-[crew chuckles] -[chuckling] What do I do next?
[Jane] Evelyne figured out, "All right, where else can I find that proof?"
translation.zh:
‎伊夫琳心想：
‎“哪里可以找到确凿的证据呢？”

translation.en: She would've gone to school.
I tried to find a school on the tram track that she mentioned in her book.
translation.zh:
‎我企图寻找她在书中提到
‎那间电车车道旁的学校

translation.en: [chuckles] And as I walked by, I hit the school.
translation.zh: ‎途径那间学校 我走了进去

translation.en: The door was open.
I walked in and asked
if they had any record of someone with the name of Monique de Wael.
translation.zh:
‎校方有没有
‎一个叫莫妮德瓦尔的校友记录

translation.en: [Jane] So, we're biting our fingernails,
to the point that they're practically bleeding, waiting for this information.
translation.zh: ‎咬到指甲都出血了 边等待消息

translation.en: Either we've got the records or we don't.
translation.zh: ‎要么找到记录 要么一无所获

translation.en: [Evelyne] And there on the register was her name.
"De Wael, Monique."
That was really the final proof, shall I say.
translation.zh: ‎我认为这是再确凿不过的证据了

translation.en: Both the baptism certificate
and her attendance in a school in Brussels.
translation.zh: ‎以及在布鲁塞尔上学的记录

translation.en: I got to the phone, and I picked up the phone and it was Sharon.
And Sharon could hardly contain her excitement.
She practically screamed into the phone, "We've got the records! We've got the records!"
translation.zh:
‎她几乎是对着电话大喊：
‎“我们找到记录了！”

translation.en: That was the smoking gun.
[Jane] Now I've caught her in a lie.
My life had been contaminated…
[crewman] End board.
[Jane] …by a whole spiderweb of lies.
translation.zh: ‎只因为一个精心编织的谎言

translation.en: [director] Take 15 minutes, everybody.
[Jane] And here it is, exposed as a hoax.
[Defonseca, in French] Could you pass me a bottle of water, please?
-Thank you. -[Jane] I thought,
"Now, the whole story that she has been telling in the book falls apart."
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“如今她在书里所写的故事
‎都失去了逻辑性”

translation.en: At that point, I knew she was not who she said she was.
translation.zh:
‎那一刻 我已经知道
‎她不是自己口中的那个人

translation.en: [Jane] Not only was she not a Jewish child hiding in the forest from the Nazis,
translation.zh:
‎她不仅不是一个为了躲避纳粹
‎而藏身在森林里的犹太后代

translation.en: she was a Catholic child safely enrolled in school.
translation.zh:
‎她还是个天主教孩童
‎当年安安稳稳地入学

translation.en: She wasn't anywhere near wolves.
She was playing to an audience. She knew exactly what she was doing.
translation.zh:
‎她在表演给观众看
‎她很清楚自己在做什么

translation.en: Now we can see that this is not just a little white fib.
translation.zh:
‎如今我们看出
‎这不是一个无伤大雅的小谎

translation.en: This is a massive conspiracy over 20 years
translation.zh: ‎而是一个精心设计二十年的阴谋

translation.en: to propagate something that was a complete and total falsehood.
translation.zh: ‎目的是圆一个彻头彻底的谎言

translation.en: This was not the real Misha.
[Evelyne] I had many feelings.
I felt angry. I felt disgusted.
translation.zh: ‎我感到愤怒 我感到恶心

translation.en: I just saw the fake history, the fake identity,
translation.zh: ‎我发现有人虚构历史和身份

translation.en: a way to get money out of the Holocaust.
translation.zh: ‎目的是利用犹太人大屠杀来坑钱

translation.en: Somebody stole a very painful part of my life.
translation.zh:
‎有人偷走了
‎我人生中一段非常痛苦的回忆

translation.en: [inhales deeply] I felt it for myself, for my…
for all the hidden children
translation.zh: ‎为所有被藏匿起来的犹太遗孤

translation.en: and all the dead children through the Holocaust.
translation.zh:
‎为所有死在犹太人大屠杀里的孩子
‎感到难过

translation.en: For all the parents, for my parents, [inhales]
but in fact for all the Jewish community.
translation.zh: ‎甚至是为整个犹太群体感到难过

translation.en: [Jane] At the point that we got those records,
the book was a huge bestseller all over Europe
translation.zh: ‎那本回忆录是全欧洲的畅销书

translation.en: and the movie had just come out.
And the movie was called Survival with Wolves.
[male host, in French] There it is, the trailer of Véra Belmont's film.
translation.zh:
‎那个预告片
‎乃是来自维拉贝尔蒙执导的电影

translation.en: It's very touching to see you both here, the real person and little Mathilde.
translation.zh:
‎看到你们俩同时出现很感动
‎一个是本尊 一个是小马蒂尔德

translation.en: You seem very emotional.
It's as if you are reliving this story every time you see the film?
translation.zh:
‎看到这些影像
‎是不是觉得这段往事又活过来了呢？

translation.en: Yes, that's right.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 没错 非常煎熬

translation.en: That's right. It's very difficult.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 没错 非常煎熬 ‎你有没有
‎从马蒂尔德的演技中看到自己？

translation.en: Do you recognize yourself in Mathilde's acting?
translation.zh:
‎你有没有
‎从马蒂尔德的演技中看到自己？

translation.en: Absolutely, absolutely. It's very well expressed.
She plays magnificently.
She conveys the emotions very well.
It was the thought of my mother that kept me going.
translation.zh: ‎我是因为想念母亲才撑下去的

translation.en: There is a scene in the film which to me is extraordinary.
The one where she falls out of the train and she says…
[in French] Cinema, with a beautiful film inspired by a true story.
translation.zh:
‎一部启发自
‎真人真事的凄美电影上映了

translation.en: [in French] You're great.
-You're a great actress. -[chuckles]
[in French] This story is very, very moving.
An incredible story and yet a true story.
translation.zh:
‎令人感到不可思议
‎而且还是真人真事

translation.en: [in French] Cut! Excellent.
[in English] It premiered in Paris.
"Based on a true story."
And here we're holding these documents.
translation.zh: ‎这边我们手上却掌握着这些文件

translation.en: So we thought, "Let's go with this. Let's put it on my blog,
translation.zh:
‎我们心想：“一不做二不休
‎把这些资料放到我的博客上

translation.en: and let's e-mail somebody over there in Belgium."
The next morning we got up,
translation.zh: ‎隔天早上 我们一觉醒来

translation.en: it had broken front page of all the newspapers.
[newsreader, in French] A book, then a film,
translation.zh:
‎先是推出书 接着拍成电影
‎原本是个自传

translation.en: supposedly an autobiography, but everything was false.
translation.zh:
‎先是推出书 接着拍成电影
‎原本是个自传 ‎如今被揭发一切都是假的

translation.en: [in French] It was an incredible story, the story of a young Shoah survivor.
translation.zh:
‎这是个讲述
‎犹太人大屠杀幸存孩童的精彩故事

translation.en: We had fired a truth bomb. It had landed.
translation.zh:
‎我们抛出了一个真相震撼弹
‎撼动全地

translation.en: [in French] Surviving with Wolves, the bestseller that inspired the film released last month…
translation.zh:
‎根据畅销书《与狼共存》改编的电影
‎于上个月上映…

translation.en: And the whole fake thing blew up.
…is not a true story.
Everything is false.
It was a big scam.
[director, in English] House lights.
I came home, I immediately went to my computer,
translation.zh: ‎我回到家后 直接冲到电脑前

translation.en: I put in her name and there it was.
translation.zh:
‎在搜索栏上键入她的名字
‎消息找到了

translation.en: [reporter, in French] The beautiful story was entirely false.
translation.zh: ‎但这个凄美的故事原来全是捏造的

translation.en: In Belgium, her country of origin,
historians have discovered Misha Defonseca is actually Monique de Wael.
translation.zh:
‎有历史学家发现米莎德冯塞卡
‎其实是莫妮德瓦尔

translation.en: I think I felt like my blood just drained from my body, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉全身血液好像被抽干似的

translation.en: How… How can this possibly be?
I was angry.
I was sad. I was hurt.
I felt betrayed.
I felt used.
She became that close a friend to me
that when we had a litter of pups born, we named one Misha.
translation.zh:
‎以致于家里小狗出世时
‎我们把其中一只取名叫米莎

translation.en: It was just heartbreaking.
Absolutely heartbreaking.
-Hey, baby girl. -[wolf whines]
We were duped, just like the rest of you.
[Karen] That fact that she lied about her being a Holocaust survivor
translation.zh:
‎她欺骗他人说
‎自己是犹太人大屠杀的幸存者

translation.en: made me cry.
Misha Defonseca played on sympathy.
translation.zh: ‎米莎德冯塞卡操弄他人的同心情

translation.en: That's how she became a wonderful storyteller.
translation.zh: ‎她就是这样成了一个出色的故事人

translation.en: Sympathy.
That's how Misha Defonseca was able to fool people.
translation.zh:
‎米莎德冯塞卡就是通过操弄同情心
‎达到欺骗他人的目的

translation.en: Sympathy.
[Pat] I burst into tears.
I just felt so taken advantage of and lied to and all…
translation.zh: ‎我们感觉被利用、被欺骗什么的

translation.en: Ugh! The lies and the bitterness and everything came out.
translation.zh: ‎谎言、愤怒 排山倒海袭来

translation.en: Some of my neighbors did give her quite large sums of money.
translation.zh: ‎有些邻居曾捐助她一大笔钱

translation.en: We're talking $25-30,000 to help her save the house.
translation.zh:
‎两万五千、三万美元
‎帮助她留住房子

translation.en: She'd go to the rabbis and ask for donations from the temple.
translation.zh:
‎她曾向拉比求助
‎要教堂为她提供捐款

translation.en: The entire community…
that knew her, my neighbors, nobody talked to her again that I knew of.
translation.zh:
‎凡是认识她的左邻右舍
‎在真相爆发后 再也不跟她来往

translation.en: Everybody felt betrayed.
Yeah.
[Mommer, in French] There was a sort of anger that rose in me
which never left me.
The students who took part in the project,
translation.zh: ‎那些参与这个项目的学生知道后

translation.en: the day I entered the class,
there was a state of revolt.
You have to imagine a pack in revolt.
translation.zh: ‎想象一下 眼前是一群愤然抗议的人

translation.en: Rants, tears, cries.
translation.zh:
‎有人破口大骂、有人痛哭流泪
‎有人放声尖叫

translation.en: [exhales] They were standing up on the benches.
I was no longer in control,
and I usually contained my students very well.
translation.zh: ‎我向来很懂得怎么安定学生

translation.en: I contacted Misha straight away.
I wanted to be honest and authentic with her.
translation.zh: ‎我希望她能将心比心、坦诚相待

translation.en: But she said, "Don't worry."
translation.zh:
‎可是她说：“放心吧
‎他们经常用这种方式攻击我

translation.en: "It must be the doing of the publisher in America."
[Jane, in English] And then came the next twist in the story.
translation.zh: ‎接着事情又迎来另一个转折点

translation.en: It couldn't have gotten more bizarre.
translation.zh: ‎事情已经变得不能再离奇下去了

translation.en: I said to myself, "I could never make up this plot."
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“这种故事
‎绝对不是我编得出来的”

translation.en: If I did, somebody would say,
translation.zh: ‎要是做的人是我 一定会有人说

translation.en: "This is preposterous. This would not happen."
translation.zh: ‎“这么做太可恶了 不能这么做”

translation.en: [Marc Metdepenningen, in French] Every journalist dreams of a scoop.
translation.zh:
‎每个记者的梦想
‎就是揭发不为人知的真相

translation.en: The question for me was,
translation.zh: ‎我的疑问是 如果她的故事是假的

translation.en: if her story is false,
translation.zh: ‎我的疑问是 如果她的故事是假的 ‎（马克梅德亨宁根）

translation.en: then what is her real story?
What I simply did
translation.zh: ‎于是我做了一个非常简单的动作

translation.en: was go through the Brussels phone book
translation.zh: ‎我去翻查布鲁塞尔的电话簿

translation.en: where there are approximately 400 de Waels.
translation.zh: ‎上面有大约四百个姓德瓦尔的人

translation.en: So I started to call them one after the other.
And at the 44th or 43rd name,
I stumbled across a woman called Emma de Wael.
translation.zh: ‎我找到了一个叫艾玛德瓦尔的妇女

translation.en: [Marc] My meeting with Emma, Misha's aunt,
was extraordinary.
She didn't go off in search of her parents?
translation.zh: ‎她不曾横跨欧洲寻找父母吗？

translation.en: [in French] Good God, no.
She stayed with her grandfather and grandmother.
translation.zh: ‎（艾玛德瓦尔） ‎她小时候跟爷爷奶奶住在一起

translation.en: Emma told me
her niece had always been delusional,
that she would create imaginary worlds for herself.
I went and fetched her regularly
with the number 56 tram to Anderlecht
translation.zh:
‎我会乘搭56号电车
‎到安德莱赫特去接她

translation.en: and brought her to Schaerbeek.
translation.zh: ‎然后带她回到斯哈尔贝克镇

translation.en: In the evenings, I took her back to Uncle Ernest.
translation.zh:
‎到了晚上
‎我就送她回欧内斯特叔叔的家

translation.en: [Marc] Emma de Wael told me the truth
about what happened during the war.
translation.zh: ‎战争期间到底发生了什么事

translation.en: What happened to Robert de Wael, Misha Defonseca's father.
translation.zh:
‎米莎德冯塞卡的父亲
‎罗伯特德瓦尔到底经历了什么

translation.en: [man, in French] Robert de Wael worked at Schaerbeek town hall.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特德瓦尔
‎以前在斯哈尔贝克镇政厅上班

translation.en: He was really very patriotic
translation.zh:
‎他充满爱国情操
‎是个尽忠职守的预备军官

translation.en: and very engaged in his role as a reserve officer.
translation.zh:
‎他充满爱国情操
‎是个尽忠职守的预备军官 ‎（尚菲利普唐德）

translation.en: I met Jean-Philippe Tondeur by chance
translation.zh:
‎我在偶然的机遇下认识了
‎尚菲利普唐德

translation.en: but he had a lot of documentation
on Misha Defonseca's father.
translation.zh: ‎跟米莎德冯塞卡的生父有关

translation.en: So I went to consult Robert de Wael's file.
translation.zh: ‎于是我去查了罗伯特德瓦尔的档案

translation.en: [Tondeur] On 10th of May, 1940, the Germans invade Belgium.
translation.zh: ‎1940年5月10日 德国入侵比利时

translation.en: [Tondeur] They crush the Belgian army during an 18-day campaign.
translation.zh:
‎经历连续18天的对峙后
‎比利时军被德军击溃

translation.en: The king surrenders
and Belgium is occupied.
Robert de Wael joins the resistance…
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特德瓦尔加入起义运动

translation.en: …and begins to recruit resistance fighters.
[Marc] As a resistance fighter,
Robert de Wael
was involved in gathering weapons…
activating intelligence networks
and transmitting intelligence to the Belgian government
translation.zh: ‎将情报转交给比利时政府高层

translation.en: which had gone to London.
Unfortunately, Robert de Wael wasn't very discreet about his activities for the resistance.
translation.zh:
‎不幸的是
‎罗伯特德瓦尔执行任务时动作太大

translation.en: [Emma de Wael] He had a loose tongue.
He was proud of what he was doing.
Because I knew he had secret documents.
translation.zh: ‎我知道他手上掌握着机密文件

translation.en: He even showed them to us at home.
translation.zh: ‎他甚至在家里拿出来给家人看

translation.en: My father told him to be careful,
that he was becoming careless.
He risked arrest.
He was denounced by a Nazi collaborator
and was quickly arrested.
[Tondeur] Robert de Wael, his wife and 41 arrested resistance fighters
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特德瓦尔和他的妻子
‎连同41一个起义斗士

translation.en: are deported to Germany…
and sent to the Brauweiler Prison in Cologne.
translation.zh: ‎关在位于科隆的布劳韦勒监狱里

translation.en: The Cologne prison had a very harsh regime.
[Tondeur] He is interrogated by the Gestapo.
He starts to scream.
Robert de Wael cracks.
[Marc] Robert de Wael made a deal in the Cologne prison.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特德瓦尔在科隆监狱
‎与德军达成协议

translation.en: This deal involved him
handing over the names of his fellow resistance fighters
translation.zh: ‎协议内容包括他必须交出 ‎其他起义斗士的名字

translation.en: in exchange for his wife being protected
and to once again see his daughter, Misha Defonseca.
translation.zh:
‎以及见女儿米莎德冯塞卡
‎最后一面的机会

translation.en: [Tondeur] In August 1942, after betraying his fellow officers,
as the Germans had demanded of him,
Robert de Wael got one last opportunity to see his daughter.
translation.zh: ‎因此得到了见女儿最后一面的机会

translation.en: And that would be
the end for…
for Robert de Wael, who was later deported.
translation.zh: ‎也来到了终点 ‎后来 他被遣送出国

translation.en: Robert and his wife Germaine would both die in the German camps.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特和他的妻子杰曼妮
‎双双死在纳粹集中营里

translation.en: We called her "The Traitor's Daughter."
Because it was said that her father
sided with the Germans.
[Tondeur] The municipality of Schaerbeek would engrave a plaque
translation.zh: ‎哈尔贝克镇政厅刻了一个纪念碑

translation.en: in the name of the resistance fighters who died during the war.
translation.zh:
‎上面刻着战争时期
‎牺牲的起义斗士名字

translation.en: Robert de Wael, whose name was listed last…
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特德瓦尔的名字排在最后

translation.en: was later erased.
[Marc] On 22nd of February 2008, once things were very clear,
translation.zh:
‎2008年2月22日
‎真相已经非常清楚了

translation.en: uh, we published Robert de Wael's whole story,
translation.zh: ‎我们刊登了罗伯特德瓦尔的生平故事

translation.en: the betrayal,
the falseness of Misha Defonseca's account.
translation.zh: ‎以及米莎德冯塞卡的诈骗行为

translation.en: And in the hours that followed,
a statement was issued.
This is Misha Defonseca's statement.
translation.zh: ‎发表这项声明的人是米莎德冯塞卡

translation.en: "They called me 'The Traitor's Daughter'
translation.zh:
‎声明上写着：
‎“我被称为‘叛国者的女儿’

translation.en: because my father was suspected of having spoken under torture."
translation.zh:
‎因为有人怀疑我父亲
‎受不了严刑逼供而供出同党”

translation.en: "This book, this story, is mine."
translation.zh: ‎这本书、这个故事 是属于我的

translation.en: "It is not the actual reality,
but it was my reality…
my way of surviving."
"I ask forgiveness."
"All I ever wanted was to exorcise my suffering."
[in French] I felt so rejected,
but I could not explain it to myself,
neither to my grandmother or my grandfather.
I am not the girl I thought,
translation.zh: ‎我不是自己心里所想的那个女孩

translation.en: but there are times…
when I still hesitate.
I say to myself, "Did I or didn't I experience it?"
translation.zh:
‎我问自己：
‎“我到底有没有经历过这些事？”

translation.en: I have to think.
Particularly with animals.
Particularly with animals.
-[growling] -I can still see myself
rolling on the ground with wolves.
Have you seen my lovely wolves?
translation.zh: ‎你们看到我这些可爱的狼了吗？

translation.en: They will always be
my wolves.
I will be always at their side.
Even if I know the truth now.
I am at their side.
I got into a bubble, a world of my own.
And this world of mine was filled with animals.
translation.zh: ‎在这个世界里 到处都是野生动物

translation.en: Animals that defended me
against humans.
[Candy, in English] Listening back to this interview,
the first words in the intro to the show were…
[on radio] "Sometimes a story's so astonishing, -it's unbelievable." -[mouthing along]
translation.zh:
‎“有时候 故事太过震撼
‎几乎不可思议”

translation.en: That's pretty astonishing. [chuckles] That those were the first words.
translation.zh:
‎故事的确挺震撼人心的
‎那是节目的开场白

translation.en: And then it turns out, it's not true.
I believed her.
I didn't see anything in those eyes
that made me think she wasn't telling me the truth.
[Defonseca on headphones] Fear for me, at this time, was the German.
It was the…
[Candy O'Terry] All I was doing was looking for more truth
translation.zh: ‎我只是一味地挖掘更多真相

translation.en: to confirm what I already believed.
In hindsight, it's chilling.
translation.zh: ‎事后看来 我感到不寒而栗

translation.en: But for me, at that moment,
I was so respectful of someone's experience,
at what I think we all, as citizens of the world,
will recognize was the darkest time in the history of our world.
translation.zh:
‎我们都认同
‎那是世界历史上最黑暗的时期

translation.en: Far be it from me to question her.
[Debórah Dwork] Questioning someone's claim to be a Holocaust survivor
translation.zh: ‎质疑某人是不是犹太大屠杀幸存者

translation.en: is very difficult.
One brings a great deal of diffidence to those claims.
translation.zh: ‎说不信这些故事会引起极大的反弹

translation.en: But the danger of believing everything
puts history
and the historical reality of genuine survivors at risk.
translation.zh: ‎以及真正幸存者的历史真相遭受危害

translation.en: In December 1996,
I got a letter and a manuscript from Jane Daniel.
translation.zh: ‎我收到珍丹尼尔寄来的信和初稿

translation.en: That manuscript was Misha: A Mémoire
by a young girl during the Holocaust.
translation.zh:
‎作者是个年轻时
‎经历过犹太人大屠杀的女子

translation.en: I called Jane Daniel
to explain why this narrative just did not work.
translation.zh: ‎解释为什么这份自述不能集结成书

translation.en: I said to her,
"I would not publish this book."
translation.zh: ‎“换成是我 我是不会出版这本书的”

translation.en: I have thought a lot over the years
translation.zh: ‎这些年来 我经常在思考

translation.en: as to why Jane Daniel decided to go forward with publication.
translation.zh: ‎为什么珍丹尼尔坚决出版这本书

translation.en: She clearly hoped
that the manuscript was true,
but she clearly worried that it was not.
translation.zh: ‎然而她显然也怀疑过其真伪

translation.en: I think it was greed
that powered this narrative
for Misha and Jane Daniel.
translation.zh: ‎米莎和珍丹尼尔去发表这个故事

translation.en: And then, as those sales figures rose,
more and more people
accepted the memoir as real and as true.
translation.zh: ‎相信这个回忆录来自真人真事

translation.en: [Jane] I admit it, I had created the monster.
translation.zh: ‎我承认 ‎是我创造了这个恶魔

translation.en: She was my monster.
I had created this person with enormous sympathy as a character.
translation.zh: ‎我创造了一个深得他人同情的人

translation.en: Somebody who had suffered terribly.
Somebody who deserved respect and, in fact, awe.
And nobody wants to admit that they were tricked.
And I admit it, I was tricked by her, I believed her.
translation.zh: ‎但我承认 我被她骗了 我信了她

translation.en: Everybody was seduced.
The American jurisprudence system, the judges and the juries,
translation.zh: ‎包括美国司法体系、法官和陪审团

translation.en: we were all seduced by the story.
[Evelyne] It's human to believe.
Credibility is something else.
It's your need to question if things are not
translation.zh: ‎我们有必要质疑事情的真伪

translation.en: that will help you discern what's true and what's not true.
translation.zh: ‎这样才能让我们分辨出真假

translation.en: [in French] You killed a human being with a knife?
Because I saw the rape of a little girl.
translation.zh: ‎因为我看到他强暴一个小女孩

translation.en: [Mommer, in French] I have enough distance
to take a more analytical look at Misha's character.
When I saw that, I jumped because he turned and came towards me.
translation.zh:
‎我看到那一幕后跳了起来
‎他转身朝我冲过来

translation.en: At that moment, I only thought about one thing,
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 我只想到一件事

translation.en: to live.
Because I wanted to live.
Misha created a world for herself,
translation.zh: ‎米莎创造了一个属于她自己的世界

translation.en: a world of her own belief.
When he was close, I stabbed him in the stomach.
translation.zh: ‎他靠近时 我往他的腹部捅了一刀

translation.en: I slashed everywhere.
The throat, the face.
I was covered in blood.
It was horrible.
Writing this book
has caused me to relive…
[voice breaking] …my nightmares.
[Mommer] Misha sought refuge in mythomania,
translation.zh: ‎米莎只是从惯性说谎中寻找慰藉

translation.en: and with time,
she slowly becomes
a character in her own story.
Every time I stabbed,
it was for this little girl, it was for the children,
translation.zh:
‎我心想是为了那个女孩
‎是为了其他孩子

translation.en: it was for my parents.
[in English] I think that we would like to believe
that Misha Defonseca believed
that she was a survivor of the Holocaust.
translation.zh: ‎相信她是犹太人大屠杀的幸存者

translation.en: I think we would like to believe
that we were not so naive,
that we believed it because she believed it.
And we would even like to believe
that this narrative has a redemptive purpose,
translation.zh: ‎这个故事有一种救赎的意义

translation.en: because it made right the wrong of her childhood.
translation.zh: ‎因为这个故事纠正了她错误的童年

translation.en: I think it's nonsense.
There is no redemptive purpose.
translation.zh: ‎整件事根本没有救赎的意义

translation.en: We were so naive.
It was all a fabrication.
[Evelyne] How I feel about her today…
Mixed… Mixed emotions.
I think that she was a protagonist of this story, but she was not alone.
translation.zh:
‎我认为她是这个故事的主角
‎但不是唯一的主角

translation.en: There were other people that helped
to make this, uh, biography be a bestseller.
[Evelyne] Just talking about her right now, and the search,
translation.zh:
‎如今说起这个女人
‎以及寻找真相的过程

translation.en: and the years that went by…
Some pity…
Some pity.
Some repulsion…
Maybe it's too hard a word, but…
translation.zh: ‎也许很难用一个字来概括 但是…

translation.en: I'm feeling some uh, understanding.
As a child, it must have been very difficult for her after the war,
translation.zh: ‎身为一个孩子 ‎在经历战争过后 肯定过得不容易

translation.en: the fact that her father was called a traitor, a collaborator.
translation.zh: ‎况且她父亲被称为叛国者 ‎纳粹同党

translation.en: She's both a victim and a villain.
translation.zh: ‎她既是受害者 也是造恶者

translation.en: She's both.
She is both in this story.
translation.zh: ‎在这个故事里 两者皆是
